name: District 17
description:
Plot:

357 years from the rebirth of the Earth. Cities rise like monoliths above scorched soil. The Earth government has banned the cultivation and consumption of biological plants, as they contain vitamins that have a narcotic effect on the people of the new generation. In District 17, a girl was growing a tomato plant at her home until a police drone discovered it. Now the girl is forced to flee from persecution outside the city and district 17.

Input:
  • Movement and choice direction attack:
    Xbox & PS: D-Pad/Left Stick
    Keyboard: A/D
  • Jump:
    Xbox: A
    PS: ☓
    Keyboard: W
  • Attack:
    Xbox: X
    PS:  ☐
    Keyboard: Space
  • Slide:
    Xbox & PS: Down Arrow/Left Stick Down
    Keyboard: S
  • Interact:
    Xbox: RB
    PS: R1
    Keyboard: E
  • Eat Tomato:
    Xbox: RT
    PS: R2
    Keyboard: Q
